An AI document extraction & content anal: An AI document extraction & content analysis platform that transforms unstructured files (PDFs, images, URLs, etc.) into structured data.
Upload a file and immediately receive ex: Upload a file and immediately receive extracted content
Fetches successful data from extraction. Note: The API recommends a 2-second delay between requests to avoid rate-limiting.
The file to upload for extraction. Suppo: The file to upload for extraction. Supported: PDF, images (JPEG, PNG, TIFF, BMP), Word docs (DOC, DOCX), text files (TXT)
A descriptive name for the extraction: A descriptive name for the extraction
Document's language for accurate extract: Document's language for accurate extraction. Extracta.ai supports multiple languages with advanced AI algorithms designed to parse linguistic nuances.
Define the data fields you want to extra: Define the data fields you want to extract from documents
Whether the document contains charts, gr: Whether the document contains charts, graphs, or diagrams
Whether to recognize checkboxes and thei: Whether to recognize checkboxes and their states
Enable for very large or complex documen: Enable for very large or complex documents
Treat each PDF page as a separate extrac: Treat each PDF page as a separate extraction unit
Extract only a specified range of pages: Extract only a specified range of pages
Starting page number (required if Specif: Starting page number (required if Specific Page Processing is enabled)
Ending page number (required if Specific: Ending page number (required if Specific Page Processing is enabled)
Document file to upload (PDF, images, et: Document file to upload (PDF, images, etc.)
The ID of the batch to add files to (opt: The ID of the batch to add files to (optional). If not provided, a new batch will be created.
The ID of the file (optional). If provid: The ID of the file (optional). If provided, filters results to only that file.
Triggers when a document extraction is s: Triggers when a document extraction is successfully processed.

\nTo use this trigger, you need to manua:
To use this trigger, you need to manually set up a single webhook endpoint in your Extracta.ai account. This endpoint will receive all events, and Activepieces will filter for the correct one.

1.  **Login** to your Extracta.ai dashboard.
2.  Navigate to the **API** section from the side menu.
3.  Scroll down to **Webhook Settings**.
4.  Click **"Create a new webhook"** (or edit an existing one).
5.  Paste the following URL into the **Endpoint URL** field:
    ```text
    {{webhookUrl}}
    ```
6.  Click **Save**.

This single webhook will now send all events to Activepieces. This trigger will only activate for the **'extraction.failed'** event.
